channel.title: Zte blade can't connect to camera
channel.description: I finally got my ZTE Blade. After a while of playing with it I decided to put Cyanogenmod on it, as it seemed to be the best ROM for the blade. I got version 7.1.0. All went well, and although booting feels a bit slower than with the original ROM, I'm pretty satisfied with it. But now I tried to take a picture, and I get an error. It can't connect to the camera. I didn't buy the phone for it's camera, as it's not the best out there, but I still want it working. Anyone here familiar with the problem? Is it as simple as putting a different version of Cyanogenmod on it or not?

item.title: Zte blade can't connect to camera
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Try a newer or older version of Cyanogenmod, or maybe a nightly.

Read full topic
item.source: Zte blade can't connect to camera

item.title: Zte blade can't connect to camera
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

So I’m better off using Moldovan? It’s supposedly less stable, but it’s pretty annoying to have a phone with a camera that doesn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: Zte blade can't connect to camera

item.title: Zte blade can't connect to camera
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

cyanogenmod support varies across mobiles, sometimes the radio doesn’t work other times the camera/video doesn’t

Read full topic
item.source: Zte blade can't connect to camera

item.title: Zte blade can't connect to camera
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Probably the rom that you put on doesnt have camera support yet.

Read full topic
